text: Kohautia socotrana is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Socotra island of Yemen, off the coast of Africa. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests and subtropical or tropical dry shrubland. ==Sources== * socotrana Category:Endemic flora of Socotra Category:Flora of Yemen Category:Data deficient plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Kohautia socotrana
